title: Explorer's Guide to Wildlife Adventures
description: Find out where you can go camping in the pristine wilderness with moose or experience the beauty of the fall foliage with elk. Listen to the comical sounds of the snowy egret during mating season and feel the mist from the humpback whale as it comes up for air. To fully appreciate this Guide it is necessary to start with a love of the outdoors, a fascination with animals, and a good sense of adventure. The beginning of your next journey is just pages away, are you ready?
author: J.Z. Hunt
